text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: evam uktas tu vipreNa dharmavyAdho yudhiSThira
text.ur: evam uktas tu vipreṇa dharmavyādho yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: pratyuvAca yathA vipraM tac chRNuSva narAdhipa
text.ur: pratyuvāca yathā vipraṁ tac chr̥ṇuṣva narādhipa

text.ascii: vyAdha uvAca
text.ur: vyādha uvāca

text.ascii: vijJAnArthaM manuSyANAM manaH pUrvaM pravartate
text.ur: vijñānārthaṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ manaḥ pūrvaṁ pravartate

text.ascii: tat prApya kAmaM bhajate krodhaM ca dvijasattama
text.ud: तत्प्राप्य कामं भजते क्रोधं च द्विजसत्तम
text.ur: tat prāpya kāmaṁ bhajate krodhaṁ ca dvijasattama

text.ascii: tatas tadarthaM yatate karma cArabhate mahat
text.ur: tatas tadarthaṁ yatate karma cārabhate mahat

text.ascii: iSTAnAM rUpagandhAnAm abhyAsaM ca niSevate
text.ur: iṣṭānāṁ rūpagandhānām abhyāsaṁ ca niṣevate

text.ascii: tato rAgaH prabhavati dveSaz ca tadanantaram
text.ur: tato rāgaḥ prabhavati dveṣaś ca tadanantaram

text.ascii: tato lobhaH prabhavati mohaz ca tadanantaram
text.ur: tato lobhaḥ prabhavati mohaś ca tadanantaram

text.ascii: tasya lobhAbhibhUtasya rAgadveSahatasya ca
text.ur: tasya lobhābhibhūtasya rāgadveṣahatasya ca

text.ascii: na dharme jAyate buddhir vyAjAd dharmaM karoti ca
text.ud: न धर्मे जायते बुद्धिर्व्याजाद्धर्मं करोति च
text.ur: na dharme jāyate buddhir vyājād dharmaṁ karoti ca

text.ascii: vyAjena carate dharmam arthaM vyAjena rocate
text.ur: vyājena carate dharmam arthaṁ vyājena rocate

text.ascii: vyAjena sidhyamAneSu dhaneSu dvijasattama
text.ur: vyājena sidhyamāneṣu dhaneṣu dvijasattama

text.ascii: tatraiva ramate buddhis tataH pApaM cikIrSati
text.ur: tatraiva ramate buddhis tataḥ pāpaṁ cikīrṣati

text.ascii: suhRdbhir vAryamANaz ca paNDitaiz ca dvijottama
text.ur: suhr̥dbhir vāryamāṇaś ca paṇḍitaiś ca dvijottama

text.ascii: uttaraM zrutisaMbaddhaM bravIti zrutiyojitam
text.ur: uttaraṁ śrutisaṁbaddhaṁ bravīti śrutiyojitam

text.ascii: adharmas trividhas tasya vardhate rAgadoSataH
text.ur: adharmas trividhas tasya vardhate rāgadoṣataḥ

text.ascii: pApaM cintayate cApi bravIti ca karoti ca
text.ud: पापं चिन्तयते चापि ब्रवीति च करोति च
text.ur: pāpaṁ cintayate cāpi bravīti ca karoti ca

text.ascii: tasyAdharmapravRttasya guNA nazyanti sAdhavaH
text.ur: tasyādharmapravr̥ttasya guṇā naśyanti sādhavaḥ

text.ascii: ekazIlAz ca mitratvaM bhajante pApakarmiNaH
text.ur: ekaśīlāś ca mitratvaṁ bhajante pāpakarmiṇaḥ

text.ascii: sa tenAsukham Apnoti paratra ca vihanyate
text.ur: sa tenāsukham āpnoti paratra ca vihanyate

text.ascii: pApAtmA bhavati hy evaM dharmalAbhaM tu me zRNu
text.ud: पापात्मा भवति ह्येवं धर्मलाभं तु मे शृणु
text.ur: pāpātmā bhavati hy evaṁ dharmalābhaṁ tu me śr̥ṇu

text.ascii: yas tv etAn prajJayA doSAn pUrvam evAnupazyati
text.ur: yas tv etān prajñayā doṣān pūrvam evānupaśyati

text.ascii: kuzalaH sukhaduHkheSu sAdhUMz cApy upasevate
text.ur: kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkheṣu sādhūṁś cāpy upasevate

text.ascii: tasya sAdhusamArambhAd buddhir dharmeSu jAyate
text.ur: tasya sādhusamārambhād buddhir dharmeṣu jāyate

text.ascii: brAhmaNa uvAca
text.ur: brāhmaṇa uvāca

text.ascii: bravISi sUnRtaM dharmaM yasya vaktA na vidyate
text.ud: ब्रवीषि सूनृतं धर्मं यस्य वक्ता न विद्यते
text.ur: bravīṣi sūnr̥taṁ dharmaṁ yasya vaktā na vidyate

text.ascii: divyaprabhAvaH sumahAn RSir eva mato 'si me
text.ur: divyaprabhāvaḥ sumahān r̥ṣir eva mato ’si me

text.ascii: vyAdha uvAca
text.ur: vyādha uvāca

text.ascii: brAhmaNA vai mahAbhAgAH pitaro 'grabhujaH sadA
text.ur: brāhmaṇā vai mahābhāgāḥ pitaro ’grabhujaḥ sadā

text.ascii: teSAM sarvAtmanA kAryaM priyaM loke manISiNA
text.ud: तेषां सर्वात्मना कार्यं प्रियं लोके मनीषिणा
text.ur: teṣāṁ sarvātmanā kāryaṁ priyaṁ loke manīṣiṇā

text.ascii: yat teSAM ca priyaM tat te vakSyAmi dvijasattama
text.ud: यत्तेषां च प्रियं तत्ते वक्ष्यामि द्विजसत्तम
text.ur: yat teṣāṁ ca priyaṁ tat te vakṣyāmi dvijasattama

text.ascii: namaskRtvA brAhmaNebhyo brAhmIM vidyAM nibodha me
text.ud: नमस्कृत्वा ब्राह्मणेभ्यो ब्राह्मीं विद्यां निबोध मे
text.ur: namaskr̥tvā brāhmaṇebhyo brāhmīṁ vidyāṁ nibodha me

text.ascii: idaM vizvaM jagat sarvam ajayyaM cApi sarvazaH
text.ur: idaṁ viśvaṁ jagat sarvam ajayyaṁ cāpi sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: mahAbhUtAtmakaM brahman nAtaH parataraM bhavet
text.ur: mahābhūtātmakaṁ brahman nātaḥ parataraṁ bhavet

text.ascii: mahAbhUtAni khaM vAyur agnir Apas tathA ca bhUH
text.ur: mahābhūtāni khaṁ vāyur agnir āpas tathā ca bhūḥ

text.ascii: zabdaH sparzaz ca rUpaM ca raso gandhaz ca tadguNAH
text.ud: शब्दः स्पर्शश्च रूपं च रसो गन्धश्च तद्गुणाः
text.ur: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṁ ca raso gandhaś ca tadguṇāḥ

text.ascii: teSAm api guNAH sarve guNavRttiH parasparam
text.ur: teṣām api guṇāḥ sarve guṇavr̥ttiḥ parasparam

text.ascii: pUrvapUrvaguNAH sarve kramazo guNiSu triSu
text.ur: pūrvapūrvaguṇāḥ sarve kramaśo guṇiṣu triṣu

text.ascii: SaSThas tu cetanA nAma mana ity abhidhIyate
text.ur: ṣaṣṭhas tu cetanā nāma mana ity abhidhīyate

text.ascii: saptamI tu bhaved buddhir ahaMkAras tataH param
text.ur: saptamī tu bhaved buddhir ahaṁkāras tataḥ param

text.ascii: indriyANi ca paJcaiva rajaH sattvaM tamas tathA
text.ud: इन्द्रियाणि च पञ्चैव रजः सत्त्वं तमस्तथा
text.ur: indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva rajaḥ sattvaṁ tamas tathā

text.ascii: ity eSa saptadazako rAzir avyaktasaMjJakaH
text.ur: ity eṣa saptadaśako rāśir avyaktasaṁjñakaḥ

text.ascii: sarvair ihendriyArthais tu vyaktAvyaktaiH susaMvRtaH
text.ur: sarvair ihendriyārthais tu vyaktāvyaktaiḥ susaṁvr̥taḥ

text.ascii: caturviMzaka ity eSa vyaktAvyaktamayo guNaH
text.ur: caturviṁśaka ity eṣa vyaktāvyaktamayo guṇaḥ

text.ascii: etat te sarvam AkhyAtaM kiM bhUyo zrotum icchasi
text.ur: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṁ kiṁ bhūyo śrotum icchasi
